tasks.name: Add trade-in and tax rate inputs to the calculator
tasks.notes: Surface the remaining PRD inputs with inline validation and formatting.

tasks.name: Call /api/quote from the frontend calculator
tasks.notes: Send the full payload (price, fees, down, trade-in, tax, APR, term) and render the API response.

tasks.name: Persist UTM parameters when tracking affiliate clicks
tasks.notes: Include utm_* values in /api/track requests and store them alongside the affiliate ID.

tasks.name: Attach affiliate and UTM metadata to lead submissions
tasks.notes: Send stored affiliate and UTM values with /api/leads and persist them server-side.

tasks.name: Extend API tests for quote, track, and lead flows
tasks.notes: Add pytest coverage for trade-in/tax math plus metadata persistence.
